subject: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} is not eligible to apply for finance with Kanda

rows.text: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} has completed their eligibility check on Kanda. Unfortunately, they are not eligible to apply for credit at this time.
Please speak to {{extras.customer.contact_name}} and their builder to discuss alternative payment options.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911.
